DOC.brief_summary: safety and efficacy of Hyper Baric Oxygen (HBO) in patients presenting with spontaneous osteonecrosis of the knee
DOC.brief_title: Hyper Baric Oxygen Therapy (HBOT) for Spontaneous Osteonecrosis of the Knee
DOC.criteria: Age4085 years Diagnosis of Spontaneous osteonecrosis of the knee (SONK)in last month, Stage 1 or 2 by MRI. Hyperbaric treatment (HBOT) in the last 2 years. Any contraindication for HBOT Pregnancy. Inability to sign inform consent Any contraindication for MRI
